rep.text: Just like it was foretold! A Na'hum appearing from thin air!
Don't you worry, my child, we know where you come from.
I am Ji'do a D'ho of this village.
*gasp* A D'ho, I am responsible for keeping everyone fed and happy.
Where am I? I was just at the excavation site a second ago...
How interesting... This is a village of the Ju'ji tribe.
It was foretold that one of your kind will come and bring salvation to us!
I don't know what you think about me, but I'm not about to save anyone...
I want to finish my job and go home! Get me back to where I was!
Now now, I can't get you back to your... excavasion?
It is said that you will only be able to return to your kin after you collect all of the pieces of the Lost Map.
Get a few pieces of paper? Doesn't sound too hard, where can I find them?
I have one of them, and I will reward you with it in return for helping the village.
Oh, I knew there was a catch somewhere...
There is a snake den right behind this village. You are to clear it and I will grant you the piece map I have.
Talk to a guard at the other end of the village, he will tell you more...
